event.text: The potent scent of burning herbs emanates from a nearby hut. Observing the makeshift abode, it's clear that sombody is living there. "Can I help you?" a croaking voice suddenly come from behind, catching you off gaurd. Turning, you see the visage of an amused witch looming in the darkness.

outcome.text: Meeting the edge of the pool, you kneel, tasting the water. Thinking it safe, you drink deep. You were wrong. The icy liquid freezes you from the inside, burning with cold and stealing your breath. After a few moments of desperately struggling for air, you are finally able to reliably catch you breathe. Shivering with cold, wariness sets in.
Relying on your powers of perception, you deduce that there's something...off about the pool. Exiling all thoughts of quenching thrist, you strive for home.
